website_summaries.verdict: A well-made whistle with a nice design that is effective for most training purposes. The satisfaction guarantee adds to its value.
pros: Durable whistle with a slim design
Works for different types of training and for numerous breeds
cons: A few owners complain that it doesn't work to control barking

customer_reviews.title: Whistle for Peace and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. One of my neighbors, let her dog ( Shepard) bark bark bark bark, early in the morning and late till night. So, I purchased this whistle for another annoyed neighbor, that lives directly across the street from the barking dog. I heard the dog bark then stop, bark then stop, not that continuous barking. She told me, that every time the dog barks, she blows the whistle and he stops. What a relief !! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: BrownSugar

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my dog. Have tried it for several weeks. She recognized the whistle sound but it did not distract or change her behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Not a single change in behavior-- no effect what so ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a single change in behavior-- no effect what so ever. We have small & large dogs and we can't seem to get it to work on either.
customer_reviews.author: jessi helgren

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste.
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing. I don't even think the damn dog can hear it. I've even adjusted it. Complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Does not work, Do not waste your money, i have 3 small dogs and 1 large dog, We worked with them 1 at a time to see if they would acknowledge the sound and it did not phase them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Went from "bark, bark" to "BARK! BARK! BARK! BARK!"
customer_reviews.text: great idea but it made the dogs bark more (and yes we tried adjusting to different levels).
customer_reviews.author: JudiJudiJudi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs reacted to the whistle the first couple of times I used it. After that no reaction at all. I question whether it was working at all. I know it is supposed to be heard by the dogs and not necessarily by humans but I feel it is more a case of "the king has no clothes."
customer_reviews.author: Net shopper

customer_reviews.title: If it can shut up a Chihuahua it can work on any dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a 6 year old Chihuahua that barks at every car door, person walking by, and everything else. In frustration, desperation we bought this whistle. After one week of a short blow after every bark - coupled with the "stop barking" command, I think he is beginning to get it. He may still go tearing for the door at every sound but after the very first bark/whistle combo he quickly settles into a low, soft growl. I'd say it works. The lanyard is nice so we always have it at hand. Thinking of ordering another one so each of us can have one at the ready. Conclusion - it works if you use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt & Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money..waste of time...sorry I purchased this!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a waste of money, a waste of time and I so regret purchasing this item and from this vendor. The product was so cheaply made so I requested a return authorization, received it, mailed the item back only to have it returned to me saying it was not approved for return. I will not be back to purchase from this vendor and the product was just as bad.
customer_reviews.author: carrottop

customer_reviews.title: YMMV
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely not silent but it does work. The first time I tried adjusting it I was in my backyard and a neighbor's dog two houses up started barking. I was blowing very hard through it. I bought it to stop my other neighbor's dogs from barking as my neighbors apparently enjoying barking dogs constantly. Their two little rat dogs ran away when I blew it at them but it's so loud that my neighbor walked over and started peeking through the fence to see what I was doing.
customer_reviews.author: VintagePhil1974

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very pleased with the new dog whistle
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with the new dog whistle. My neighbor's dog doesn't know what hit him! At least he's quiet now! The lanyard leaves much to be desired, though. Whatever it's made from is very irritating on the neck so I can't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie yaeger

customer_reviews.title: Finally was able to shut my neighbors annoying dog up with this whistle!
customer_reviews.text: Finally was able to shut my neighbors dog up with this thing! Make sure you are in decent proximity to the dog. Obviously won't really do anything if you are too far away. Every time the annoying mutt barks I use this. Dog has come to associate it's barking with an unpleasant piercing sound of this whistle, and it has stopped. Nothing else worked. This did. You can barely hear it, but the dog sure can. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Service was good from the vendor. Only problem is locating adjustment screw in the beginning. Working well now .
customer_reviews.text: Nice whistle. Just takes a while to figure out how to adjust the pitch. I didn’t realize, at first, that you need to slip the black cover part of the whistle off in order to locate and adjust the screw part. Once I found a pitch that my dog responded to, I replaced the dark cover. The lanyard is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gram

customer_reviews.title: AMEN!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say” Amen” My neighbors dogs TOTALLY HAD ME REELING!! What was I going to do? They wake me up all am and pm😤😤 😇😇. Thank Gid for them I thought of a DOG WHISTLE. Not knowing what to expect... the next time that dog started barking I blew that whistle Hard and Long ...... low and Behold. I have tamed the Beast’s ! .... and all my friends with dogs know that when I come around... Barking will Cease. This is the BEST EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scary dog
customer_reviews.text: I got this to discourage the neighbors dog who I'm absolutely terrified of. If it's out there and I go out to the mailbox the thing is 8 feet away, snapping at the fence and trying to kill me! This at least seems to get its attention but time will tell if it gets the idea. At least it's got something to actually bark at now. My cats on the other hand will come running to me when they hear this, so if they like it and the dog hates it it's a win-win for me!
customer_reviews.author: ArgentosmomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Short blow and here they come
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy as the whistle only needs a fast blow & all three of my dogs start for home. One doesn't need to blow hard or long to call them in and my dogs are spread out over 1.5 acres of land. It sure beats yelling and screaming their names. I know some question if these are humane but one second of sound is all it takes. Also my dogs have never shown discomfort in hearing tone. They return happy and ready to receive their treat. Even my 80 year old mother can get these somewhat stubborn dogs inside with ease. Great item
customer_reviews.author: Brent L. Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: didn't work on 6 different breeds in my neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: Surrounded by barking dogs in my neighborhood and bought this out of disparity. It actually made the dogs bark more! I ended up buying one of those houses that emits a noise when dogs bark and that works pretty good. pass on this one though.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie B

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this whistle. Not positive that it works (to control annoying neighbor dogs), but I think it does and I may try more adjustments. I think that possibly some of the negative feedback is because there were no instructions (I went online to find simple instructions) and it's not obvious how to access the sound adjustment (by slipping off the black plastic cover to adjust metal nuts). Looks great, seems to sound correctly, is very well made, has a lock nut to hold the sound adjustment, nice lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: Journey

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Unlike others I have tried, I can almost always make this one whistle. When I do, it always gets attention. It was pretty quick and easy to locate effective screw position, which is relatively secure. and quickly restored. Teaching dog to Come to whistle has proven well worth the trouble. When she's out of control, I can't get her attention by calling her, but this breaks through fixation and ends risk or nuisance that needs to be interrupted.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice whistle. Exactly as advertised and arrived promptly. It took a few tries to make it work since humans can't hear it. I've only had it a few days, but it stopped the neighbors dog in it's tracks. . . . oh yea. Plus, they sent a followup email without being asked. Nice touch. Plus, they sent a first time customer offer for an extra one for free. . . amazing
customer_reviews.author: Fletcheranch

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Bought This!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! I must admit, I was skeptical that this would stop the German Shepard that barks non stop next door. I gave it a try after receiving it and to my surprise the dog stopped immediately. Since then I have used it 3-4 times and the barking has decreased by 75%! The moment I blow it, the barking stops. Normally the dog will bark all day but today, he barked maybe 2-3 times. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Great dog whistle and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great whistle - my dog immediately hears it and responds. It will be a great training aide! Perfect transaction with the seller - highly recommend both of them! Just a quick note - my ratings and opinions are my own and I DID NOT receive this item at a discount or free for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love the whistle
customer_reviews.text: If my puppy barks I can use the whistle and it grabs her attention. She doesn't bark constantly so it's hard to use as a bark deterrent. My puppy is very responsive to this whistle and I reward her with a treat if she comes when she hears the whistle. I'm not a dog trainer by any means but my dad can actually whistle very loud and she comes right away. I cannot whistle loudly so this whistle is a great substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Trained my neighbors do to shut up within about 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Trained my neighbors do to shut up within about 6 hours of receiving the whistle. They were completely unaware, now the neighborhood is quiet unless something is actually afoot. Dogs should alarm when something is wrong not just to make a noise. This was a simple fix for our neighborhood. Our house hold are the only ones that knows why the barking stopped.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: That's what I like to call an attention getter...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We just bought a house with more land and part is not fenced, after a few times (and treats) my 7 month old pup knows to run straight to the fenced in part. Also, when shes in the non-fenced in part, she knows how far she can go.
customer_reviews.author: KAllen

customer_reviews.title: Works great shutting my neighbor's annoying yappy dog up
customer_reviews.text: Works great shutting my neighbor's annoying yappy dog up. Great service and seller sent several emails checking on satisfaction. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Cantrelle

customer_reviews.title: The neighbors 4 dogs bark every time they see us and our patio faces their yard and we like to spend lots of time outdoors but
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but after receiving the dog whistle, I am believer. The neighbors 4 dogs bark every time they see us and our patio faces their yard and we like to spend lots of time outdoors but, the dogs would bark continuously while trying to enjoy relaxing out on the patio. All I have to do is blow the whistle and the dogs run to the other side of their house. It seems the dogs have become afraid to even come around when we are out on the patio. Very pleased, will be enjoying my time outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Geiss

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the butt barking neighbor's dogs
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work.Yes. I'm happy. My neighbor's dogs don't stop barking. I have been successfully training them to not bark without her even knowing. No more A-hole dogs barking all day. And it doesn't hurt them.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie K.

customer_reviews.title: Good dog whistle
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected. One long blow followed by a verbal "no" and the pups have learned to stop barking when I say no. Not sure why all the negative reviews. All the whistle does is distract the dogs for a second and get their attention. You still need to put in the work to train them. It's a high pitched whistle and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing response by my mini poodle who loves to bark even at shadows. I blow twice and follow with my own natural short whistle plus "Andi come". She comes running! . Doesn't work on my 12 yr nervous barker though. Only complaints is the material is hard to hold onto and it's so slim you have to hold it like a teacup. Otherwise it's good. I didn't figure out the differences in pitch because you can't hear them and there's no explanation on how to know.
customer_reviews.author: Janie PR

customer_reviews.title: Woof-Woof Blues
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was ordered on the weekend,we received it in two days. It is well-made and is as described and illustrated. Regarding changing pitch, the instructions that accompany the whistle are very easy to understand. We bought it to try to stop a neighbor's frequently barking dog. Yes, we have spoken to the neighbor numerous times already, but the pup still yaks at us and everyone else who travels by the yard. The verdict is still out regarding it's usefulness for our intended use. We've had mixed results over the few days we've tried it. However, I'm sure it would be a good product for some Skippy owner who is trying to train his/her pup.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer51

customer_reviews.title: I really like my dog whistle
customer_reviews.text: I really like my dog whistle. Every time I let my 2 Chihuahuas outside they would bark their heads off, or whenever someone comes to the house. I started blowing the whistle and they stop right away! I used to have to yell my head off at them and that didn't work. Now I have this and it works! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Whistle for my puppy
customer_reviews.text: This is good because it offers different ranges that dogs can hear but are not as noisy as my other dog whistle. People appreciate it when I use this one. Already made a believer out of one of Penny's friend's Dad. He just ordered his online too! I always have a treat ready when I blow the whistle as per the trainer. People are very impressed to see my little monster coming over the hill like Lassie, out of nowhere or G-d know where, as soon as she hears the whistle. It's my secret weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Levine

customer_reviews.title: Has helped deter aggressive dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this whistle to deter aggressive dogs. Consistent with the research I did before purchasing this whistle, dog whistles aren't really designed for deterring aggressive dogs, so using it for this purpose provided the mixed results that the research indicated it would--it works to distract or deter about half the dogs that display aggressive behavior. The research says the primary purpose of dog whistles is for training, used over time, and that was not our purpose at all--so it's hard to say that it didn't live up to it's job--it does what we wanted, a big share of the time. It arrived quickly, as promised, and has helped with the purpose for which it was purchased.
customer_reviews.author: d. e. step

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Product For Now
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought this item to use as a dog barking deterrent, I have a two barkers next door to me. It seems to work on the smaller of the two dogs, however they are followers, so when one leaves a particular area I think because of the Whistle, the other follows, so I am thrilled. Maybe with continued use they'll bark less or recognize me as the whistle guy and remember the consequent of barking.
customer_reviews.author: OneFatDeny

customer_reviews.title: Startles the heck out of my cars, which is exactly why I got it.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that I let go outside for a couple hours. My oldest comes running as soon as I call, but the young lady takes her sweet time. I've started training them on this whistle and it's helped a lot. The noise is startling enough that both of them drop what they're doing. (Note: there's a lot more to training cats than a loud noise. You're also going to need to give them some positive feedback with tuna treats, etc. This is only for long-distance, out-door signalling).
customer_reviews.author: Edward C

customer_reviews.title: I might as well have thrown the money out a window
customer_reviews.text: Despite reading the reviews and cross checking if it would be effective with a Pit mix advising it would, I bought the dog whistle. Might as well have thrown my hard earned money out the window. I tried numerous settings without success. My dog just looked at me like "really you thought that would do something?" Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: BubbeKnits

customer_reviews.title: Dog Unfazed. Shrieking Sound Gives My Head Dizzying Pain.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loathe this product. Not only does my dog ignore it like it's a fly, but the shrieking sound feels like what I can only describe as a painful shriek that penetrates to the innermost center of my soul. Dizzying pain. I know everyone has a different tolerance, but anyone like me will feel tortured using this. But back to the dog...she barks anytime she hears people walking down the hall in our apartment or closing their doors. She's completely unfazed by the whistle while performing her apparent mission in life of making sure every neighbor knows this apartment is her territory. The whistle is just absolutely useless on her.
customer_reviews.author: Amino

customer_reviews.title: Gets attention
customer_reviews.text: I got this to blow and my puppy barks because I can't seem to stop him and I did not want to shock him. I love the lanyard I can just throw it around my neck and away we go, and when I blow it he gets his attention immediately and he stops barking, if only for a few moments
customer_reviews.author: LoraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The quality seems good with a stainless steel body
customer_reviews.text: This whistle allows you to change the frequency with the turn of a screw, but I haven't tried to experiment with that yet. Whatever frequency it is, the dogs can here it but I can't. The quality seems good with a stainless steel body, so I expect it will last a long time. I really like the included lanyard, so I can easily take it with me on walks and keep my hands free for the leashes. The effectiveness of it will depend on the dog and how you use it. If you're looking for a dog whistle, I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Houston_Greg

customer_reviews.title: Hell Hound is still barking
customer_reviews.text: Neighbor's dachshund is still barking like the little psychopath that he is. This whistle can't do anything to keep the neighbor from thinking that it's "cute" when his Hell Hound annoys the entire neighborhood. Save you money and invest in earplugs, or rat poison, or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Boxdog

customer_reviews.title: Really good value!
customer_reviews.text: Has worked pretty well for annoying neighbor dogs. And it does have an adjustable pitch sonic it doesnt work, keep adjusting the pitch (it twists on the bottom, you have to slip it out of the holder attached to the lanyard, and twist the bottom slightly, and pop it back in and it stays in very well) eventually you'll find the pitch the dog doesn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Akins

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful in controlling barking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help control excessive barking. The whistle works great on 3 of 4 of my dogs! I use the "quiet" command, then blow the whistle if they don't stop barking. My only issue with the whistle is that it doesn't seem to have a large range, when the dogs are toward the edge of my yard it doesn't seem to work as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Great dog whistle
customer_reviews.text: We haveonly had the whistle for a short period of time and it seems to be working on our hard of hearing dog.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Finally peace and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: We have the most ANNOYING yappy chihuahua next door. It will bark at us through the fence for an hour straight just because we are sitting on our patio. We bought the whistle and every time she starts in we blow the whistle and she takes off running back inside. ITS A MIRACLE. Yes you can hear the sound, but it works for us and that's all that matters. Our mini pincher doesn't seem to mind it, he just tilts his head all confused when he hears it.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: nicely packed, on time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safe and sound, nicely packed, on time, great friendly seller too! Now.....to see if we can make the neighbor's dogs zip it!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Love Nature

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend..
customer_reviews.text: High quality dog whistle withe lifetime guarantee. I have tried other brands in the past which did not work. My dog responds to this every time straight out the package. Highly recommend. I will be ordering a second one to leave in my car
customer_reviews.author: sherry in Pawleys Island

customer_reviews.title: so I am happy. Price is right
customer_reviews.text: It has helped me to train and somewhat control my rescue dogs behavior. Adjustment was a bit different for me. I pulled of the plastic tube off so I could see what was being turned to effect pitch. Not much change in sound given the adjustment range, but it is still effective, so I am happy. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Greasy

customer_reviews.title: The vendor service was excellent. Whether or not the whistle does the job ...
customer_reviews.text: The vendor service was excellent. Whether or not the whistle does the job is hard to determine. I'm trying to stop a neighbor's dog from random barking. The whistle seems to stop him after I mimic his barking for several barks but there is no permanent stoppage. Maybe it works and maybe it doesn't. There is no way to ever be sure that he even hears it. But it was a nice try in any event.
customer_reviews.author: PeterA

customer_reviews.title: My dog didn't care about this
customer_reviews.text: It was worth a shot, but this had no effect on my dog. If I'm in the same room and blow it, I might get an ear twitch, but that's it. I got hoping it would work outside to interrupt barking, but I've gotten no reaction or response after two weeks of trying.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great training whistle
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. This adjustable pitch training whistle is perfect for training new and old dogs alike. I own four dogs, two of which are puppies. This cuts through the racket and gets their attention enough for some training. Seller has contacted me several times providing encouragement and training materials. Overall, very pleased with these training whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Was my dog supposed to care?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just my dog. I mean, it's easy enough to use. You blow in it. My dog barely looked at me like, "What?". No reaction at all. He could not have cared less. I get more reaction doing my almost silent whistle through my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M Ralph

customer_reviews.title: It seems that it is very well made but I was not happy at all with the instruction sheet
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package I was impressed at the quality of the whistle. It seems that it is very well made but I was not happy at all with the instruction sheet. I feel at the very least it could explain a few general issues about the product such as the first question I had was adjusting the frequency of the whistle. The instructions say you can do this, but a picture or diagram of where to actually do this would have been helpful to me. I would return this but I my husband was so aggravated that he threw the packaging and label for return away.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Aucoin

customer_reviews.title: Good find!
customer_reviews.text: I live on a large piece of property and I love that I can just blow this whistle and no matter where my dog is, she hears it and comes running. In the beginning I praised her and gave her a treat whenever she came in response to the whistle. Wish I had thought of buying this whistle a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice product that the company obviously stands behind.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs definitely hear the whistle, so now we're all in a mode of training ourselves and the dogs to agree on exactly what it means. Having three dogs can complicate things, so I think it's time for some one on one training with our whistles. Ortz contacted us after the sale just to ask us/make sure that we were happy with their product, and that's the perfect example of a company who stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Miller

customer_reviews.title: not ultrasonic..
customer_reviews.text: high pitched not adjustable no instructions..doesn't bother or affect my dog.. lanyard is stated to be a gift but the picture shows the whistle attached to the lanyard.. bought the same whistles 3 for 16 elsewhere. once again NO INSTRUCTIONS if it is truly adjustable, I can't find it
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tomkinson

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and durable whistle for dog training.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, having read several reviews of dog whistles that mentioned the Ortz. The reviews all indicated the strengths of durability and capacity to adjust the frequency of the tone and it was an edictors choice in several reviews.I decided to give it a try. It has more than met my expectations - I am using it to train my border collie to recall on whistle command. She is responding to the whistle as training proceeds. In my estimation it is a good product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but you still have to train the dog.
customer_reviews.text: This whistle works just as it is intended to. However, you have to apply traditional training techniques to get the most out of it. I use it for distance recall in the woods. The first time I used the whistle, my dog’s ears perked up. I called him to me, rewarded him and did it 10 more times over the course of a couple of weeks. Now when I blow, he comes running (but he always gets that treat).
customer_reviews.author: M. Mugler

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm enjoying this whistle. I have a lab mix that gets overly excited when she's sees us and barks until we enter the house. It's a slow process but great process. In addition to knocking on the door she barks but is getting much better. It's a 9 year habit of hers. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lana Milton

customer_reviews.title: Bark Free Zone
customer_reviews.text: There is no problem with this whistle. Just as stated in the instructions...you may have to turn the little wheel for different dogs. Just like us they hear at different frequencies. My neighbor has 4 dogs. I don't appreciate being barked at in my own backyard. A little adjustment it works on each dog. The youngest hushes first. The oldest I think is a little deaf so it takes a little longer to get her to hush.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G. Greer

customer_reviews.title: It does work even if you can't hear it
customer_reviews.text: I like this whistle because it has so many different frequencies to get their attention.It really does work, you can tell if they''re not paying attention or sleeping and you blow it, you will get their attention real quick! ! My 2 pups got out of the fence and when I went after them they wouldn't stop, then i remembered I had the whistle around my neck and blew it and they stopped and came running back. Thank God I had it on!!
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Really training dog whistle!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! my dog really hears it! I can hear it but just a little bit, now I can get his attention!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Need to practice
customer_reviews.text: This little whistle works in the sense that the dog looks at me when the whistle is blown. It was purchased for help in reducing barking. Neither a citronella collar or ultrasonic device had any effect whatsoever. I'm quite hopeful that after more practice, he'll get the connection between the whistle sound and cessation of barking.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to anyone training a dog to be obedient
customer_reviews.text: Our dog turned one year when my husband and I decided to switch from verbal commands to using a dog whistle. He has responded incredibly well to the pitches and comes running every time. Great addition to anyone training a dog to be obedient. Allows myself to be happy with giving my dog the freedom he deserves, while knowing he will respect other people, dogs, animals, and situations he should leave alone. I simply blow the whistle and my dog obeys no matter the distraction. It saves everyone around he hearing me yell a command.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not an immediate miracle like some people think
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Not an immediate miracle like some people think. Dogs attention is caught by the sound and then it is up to you to repetitively reinforce whatever action or behavior you want from the dog. Both our Yorkies tilted their heads and pointed their ears forward when I adjusted the whistle to the perfect "attention getting" pitch for them.
customer_reviews.author: Einstein

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising. Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I’m a expert in whistles and can ensure you that dogs will not stop barking. In fact there bark even louder. This whistle is made for dogs to listen to their owner. For example if you have a dog and you tame it with the whistle, blow twice to sit down 3 time to spin etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jin

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this whistle works great.all you have to do is read the instuctions and be kind to your dog and it works perfect.should have gotten it sooner.Thanks for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS GALLOWAY

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works! My mother in law had to move in with us and brought her schnauzer. Cute dog but barks at its own shadow. The whistle has been a God send. Blow it then give a short command - "hush!" - and after two weeks I don't even need the whistle any longer. He just obeys the command and no harm to the poor old dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog whistle!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this whistle because I mountain bike and trail run with my dogs and they are off leash during. Every now and then I need an extra "umph" in my voice to control my girls and keep them by me... Deer, squirrel! My husband can do a strong loud whistle and I can not. So if I am alone this whistle works great to get their attention when my voice isn't enough. Don't expect a whistle to make a magic dog, that's in the owner but I think it is a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cone

customer_reviews.title: Barking Solution
customer_reviews.text: I followed the enclosed directions that came with this quality whistle. Sure enough, I discovered the range heard by my sweet canine. I love that it comes with the lanyard! I tend to set things down here and there and the cannot find them. I can either wear this around my neck or can easily find it because you are not just looking for a little whistle. Thank you Ortz for prompt delivery and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sledge

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see if I could train my dog to stop barking. It is taking a while, but it is working. I am afraid, she is not the smartest dog in the world, but she is catching on
customer_reviews.author: Baker lady

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to gain attention from my dog that has become badly hard of hearing (I need to almost scream to call him or wake him from a nap). After trying a few adjustments to the whistle, I was able to find a frequency that he easily heard but was not at all loud. The totally "silent to human" frequencies didn't work with him, but an adjustment that was just audible gets his attention immediately. Now I can call him without waking up everyone on the block! I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Delay

customer_reviews.title: How to adjust the frequency
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 5 Stars but in honestly I don’t know how well it worked it’s something that you have to fool around with to get the proper frequency and my puppy did not react as I expected
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo S.

customer_reviews.title: Great whistle for Labs!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Golden Retriever/Lab puppy who typically ignores our calls to come inside because she is having too much fun outside, especially at night. We blow this whistle one time and she happily gallops into the house without any other prompting. I did fiddle with the whistle to find the correct pitch. Excellent whistle for this particular class of dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for my little barkers
customer_reviews.text: I was told in the reviews before I purchased this "it'll either work, or it won't." It didn't. I read the instructions to blow the whistle while the dogs are asleep... I did and they didn't move. I tried to dial it up but there is no way to measure how high up or down you have dialed it. Im not saying it won't work for some, but it didn't work for mine. I returned it today.
customer_reviews.author: RGPRNTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I have absolutely no complaints. I read some of the negative reviews, and had to laugh because some people expected the whistle to magically train their dog to stop barking. When I got my dog's attention, I rewarded it with a treat. The only complaint I have is that the directions for adjusting the whistle are not clear. It took me awhile to figure out how to adjust the whistle and lock-in the adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: DaGodfather

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of having it around your neck when ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of having it around your neck when walking the dog. I haven't figured out the place to adjust the tone for your dog if you are using it to train the pup. My other no barking point and click is never where I need it. My pup is 9 months old and wants to bark at the boats going by on the lake. I hope this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I have several dogs that bark all the time. I blow the whistle and they stop. Have to do it several times as these dogs have done this more a long time, they act like. Dogs chasing my truck, I blow on the whistle and see an immediate response. The one did not chase my outfit yet!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This had immediate influence on our mini pincher yapper. She came to me and stopped barking when she heard the whistle. The only problem I see is my consistency. I need to be more conscientious. I would like to use is it as a training tool for all aspects of her behavior and will try to implement your program.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Silence is Golden
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a neighbor who is trying to break her dog from barking (I'm not generous, I just wanted that dog to shut up. Neighbor says she has already seen an improvement. I hope this whistle works as quickly as the product shipped to me
customer_reviews.author: L. Al-omair

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me... :(
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive it because next doors dog barks every single night when it gets dark until the owners come home. Not his fault just stupid owners with no clue.... He is an Alsatian and unfortunately this had absolutely no effect on his barking constantly. Even after numerous tries.... Quality and workmanship looked good otherwise..... Maybe it works on other dogs...
customer_reviews.author: Mark F

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work, don’t even bother
customer_reviews.text: Worse purchase ever. I wish there was a zero star rating. Should’ve trusted the many bad reviews it has. It doesn’t work. You cannot even adjust as it says, you can hear the whistle yourself and no dog even blinks, so the sound is irrelevant for them. I just flushed 10 bucks down the toilet. READ THE OTHER REVIEWS FIRST AND DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT PLEASE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: It did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to avert coyotes. Yes I modified the tonation by turning the dial, but it did NOTHING for my 3 dogs. The first time I used it, they were curious. After that, they ignored it. If they're going to ignore it, so will a coyote. I have several dens around my house, and virtually every time I go outside I see one. It drives me crazy. This did not work....
customer_reviews.author: as

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what I wanted. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: This whistle makes a high pitch whistling sound that everyone can hear. Dogs react to it ( of course so do people ) but they don't really care about it. I was hoping to use this to get the neighbor's dog to shut up and/or get out of my yard. The dogs couldn't care less. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think this works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and tried. The dogs didn’t even look at me. You can hear the air rushing through it. No animals responded to it though with multiple attempts in different settings
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Standley

customer_reviews.title: My neighbors' dog barks ALL. THE. TIME. ...
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors' dog barks ALL. THE. TIME. and this was an alternative to murder. Not really, but I was hoping it would help. The dog doesn't even notice. I also purchased an SOS horn for a boat, but I don't want to be a nuisance to my other neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise

customer_reviews.title: Great product! The dogs respond right away
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The dogs respond right away. I'm mostly interested in them stopping what they are doing and coming to me right away. I've been following the whistle with a treat and the dogs are catching on quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Semi useful. If you come up with a game plan ...
customer_reviews.text: Semi useful. If you come up with a game plan and stay with it, it works. But so many dog owners get lazy and inconsistent with training. This won't work for those people.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Kunzman

customer_reviews.title: Literally Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. No matter how much you twist it around, it never gets to the pitch it needs to be to be effective. Sounds like just like air passing through a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Porter III

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but careful.
customer_reviews.text: My dog keeps barking at the people passing by my door in my building BUT if I am home, and come close to the whistle, he doesn’t do it. So it works! Now, I cannot hear it, but my son does...thanks to him I knew not to blow it too hard or too long as it hurt his ears so I know not to hurt my dog.
customer_reviews.author: PSM

customer_reviews.title: Worked right of the package with no adjustment, definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked right of the package with no adjustment, definitely gets my neighbors dog's attention when he starts barking. He stops immediately. Of course, every breed of dog is different. What worked for me may not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: D. Saff

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Finally a whistle that my dog responds to
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the whistle. Actually this is the first time in my life that a dog whistle has actually worked. From outside and watching through the window my dog responded immediately and quite noticeably. I look forward to working with my dog further with the Ortz Dog Whistle! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Mjr

customer_reviews.title: Just the presence of this in my apartment has stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the presence of this in my apartment has stopped all of the barking dogs around me from making a ruckus. Had no idea the power it wielded without me even blowing into it. Well, I did a test blow when I first got it so maybe that scared'em straight!
customer_reviews.author: dwc

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product to try to make silence my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try to make silence my neighbor's dog, however since I got the Whistle my Neighbor keeps inside his dog. I just use a couple of time and seems to work. I really hope not to use it too much cause I'm a silence lover and hope my neighbor be more responsible
customer_reviews.author: Xavier A

customer_reviews.title: I have tried making this work for awhile now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried making this work for awhile now and neither of my dogs acknowledge it. It makes a weird sputtering sound.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs would bark at 3 am and disturb our the entire block. I used the whistle the first night... It was instant success. My dog stopped in his tracks looked at me. I blew it a second time when he didn't answer the command come. He immediately responded and obeyed the command. Amazing product... Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: Anne N.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all... no matter ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all...no matter how i adjusted the whistle.one dog barks more after blowing the whistle..and the other dog just ignores it and continues barking at same rate and tone as before the whistle was blown. So aggravating...My 4 year began using it as a toy....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Better Than Other Things I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I can't say the whistle is silent. But it gets my dog's attention, and she seems to be catching on quickly that when she barks, if she hears the whistle and then the command "Quiet!", if she stops barking, she gets a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Delisi

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd ordered it sooner
customer_reviews.text: This whistle has been terrific in training my border collie to COME. This is the only job the whistle is used for and it works great when we are in big, hilly, sprawling bark parks. Instead of me lumbering around yelling her name trying to get close enough to get her attention, I simply do a long blow on the whistle, she stops what she's doing, looks for me and my hand, and comes running. Even if she can't see me, she comes running when she hears the whistle. Mind you, her initial reward treats where bits of pound cake, but she comes now without any food reward although she gets all manner of "good girl" attention. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Whistle
customer_reviews.text: High quality whistle for a reasonable price. Some have said they had trouble working it...I can't understand why. It is simple, straightforward, and functional. More than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ortz Dog Whistle to Stop Barking - [Free Lanydard Strap] Silent Bark Control for Dogs - Ultrasonic Patrol Sound Repellent Repeller - Silver Training Deterrent Whistle - Train Your Dog
feature_bullets: EASY DAY TRAINING – adjustable to multiple frequencies – easily teach your dog unlimited commands such as sit, come, stop barking, stay, and more. Impact discipline and personally control your dog by issuing sequences that only he/she understand, regardless of their age, gender or breed. No extra-ordinary effort required – each training day is a fun, easy day

VERSATILE WHISTLE–teach your dog whatever actions or commands you want without any restrictions. Blow consistent blasts and use the rewarding-positive-behavior approach to make your dog a listening and obedient friend. Enjoy complete training freedom with Poodles, Border Collies, Sheep, Gun Dogs, German Shepherds, Bulldogs, Terriers, Rottweilers, Dachshunds, Huskies, Hunting dogs and other breeds common in the USA and Europe

MASTER CALLS–how about taking control of your dog and making them listen/obey no matter where you are? You can do that by perfecting your master call(s) on the whistle. Save yourself some wild running time and keep your best friend disciplined while in public spaces. Better yet, save your voice box from strain and conveniently ‘talk’ to your pet from far away

FREE LANDARD STRAP – focus on the training and make this lightweight dog training whistle part of you. You never have to worry about misplacing or losing your dog whistle thanks to our free top-quality Lanyard Strap. Issue commands and get in touch with your dog whenever needed by keeping the whistle with you at all times.

EXCLUSIVE ORTZ GUARANTEE– protect your whistle from dirt and particles with an included protective cover. Enjoy training your dog, and improve your communicative bond with the Ortz whistle. Anything else and we’ll make it right and process a refund or ship a replacement unit cost-free. No questions asked!
